github_repo.description: Auxiliary information about a GitHub project repository.
github_repo.$comment: All fields are strings for cross-compatibility with older importers.

github_id.description: Internal identifier from GitHub for the repository.

description.description: Description of the repository. This is `0` if no description is filled in.

create_time.description: Moment when the repository was created.

private.description: Whether the repository is not visible publicly.

forked.description: Whether the repository was forked from another repository.

star_count.description: Number of people who gave the repository a star.

watch_count.description: Number of people who follow updates of the repository.
